document.query: CREATE TABLE `purchase_media` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `type` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL , `name` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL , `url` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL , `reference_id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL , `deleted` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL , `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;
